promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple lion psychic-type pokemon wearing a galaxy-pattern crystal headband. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Galaximane, a a gigantic simple lion psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Wild Horn, Souvenir. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "psychic" or "Galaximane". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, lion-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This majestic behemoth of starry mane, roams castle grounds. Unleashes Wild Horn for defense and Souvenir to recall distant cosmos.
